1.19.2.1.0.1:
- Fixed keyboard not showing in the instruments tab
- Fixed Looper being in the instruments tab rather than instrument accessories
1.19.2.1.1:
- Added compatibility with Genshin Instruments v3.2.3
- The Violin can now extend/shorten its sound length by simply pressing the set keybind! (Right Cntrl by default)
- Fixed humongous note block instrument on large GUI scales
